Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at South Shore/71st
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, 75th, Coles and 71st due to, street blockage near South Shore/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via South Shore, 75th, Coles and 71st due to, street blockage near South Shore/71st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near South Shore/71st
ShortDescription: NB 26 South Shore Exp buses are temporarily rerouted via: South Shore, 75th, Coles, and 71st,  due to, street blockage near South Shore/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via: South Shore, 75th, Coles, and 71st, due to, street blockage near South Shore/71st.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays at O'Hare. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays at O'Hare.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
